Waterproof & Moisture: Soft PVC envelope enclosure with waterproof, clean pad with damp cloth, soft removable cover is machine washable.Do not immerse in water.
Fireproof and flame retardant pet heating pad: this product has been tested and it have the highest grade V-0 flame retardant capability.as tested in the video: burning directly with a lighter for 20 seconds will not burn.
Safety design: 59Inches/150cm Power Cord With 59Inches/150cm Chew Resistant Casing to keep safeguard you pet safe and extend the service your heating pad life.
Best suitable for dogs and cats- Help the pet (dogs, cats, rabbit, etc.) to keep healthy and comfortably in the winter. Also best for senior pets, arthritic pets, newborn pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury.

This lighted snowman would be the perfect decoration for not only indoor but also outdoor with ground stakes, zip ties, water-resistant power cord and adaptor which make it more stable and durable for outside. Attention: this outdoor Christmas decoration is NOT supposed to be used in heavy windy or rainy days.

Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)



REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live in.
LEAKPROOF & DURABLE: Our extra thick and sturdy unscented poop bags are strong enough to pick up your dog’s poop without the risk of tearing. Keep your hands clean and away from bad smells with 100% waterproof materials. Our bags are designed to lock away odors and guarantee a mess-free leakproof seal.
RELIABLE US COMPANY: We are an Illinois based small business that loves doggies. Customer satisfaction is always our first priority, and the customer trust we have built up over the years will prove this. We continue to strive to provide the best quality at an affordable price. Don’t hesitate to send us your feedback by message.
SUPER VALUE PACK: Great price for 1000 count poop bags (50 rolls with 20 bags per roll) with 1 bone shaped patented dispenser. A value package is sufficient for more than a year’s use. Our pet waste bag is designed for your convenience. Each large pet waste bag measures 9 X 13 inches, that is enough capacity for all sizes dogs and cats. SAVE UP TO 10% with Subscribe & Save.

Product Description

Small & Big Dogs and Cats Automatic Food and Water Feeder Set

3.8L Big Capacity

Both cat dog feeder and waterer measures 35.5 x 17.5 x 27 cm / 13.97 x 6.89 x 10.63 inch.Large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets, travel Accessories.you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party.

Pets Gravity Food and Water Dispenser set

Automatic Gravity Flow Technology

The food feer and water dispenser adopt Natural Gravity Supply System, food and water will gradually fill for pets eat and drink. It is no electricity required at all, can be used anywhere, and suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. perfect for pet parents with busy lifestyles.

Food Grade Material: Our feeder and waterer made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health. Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The bowl refills with water/ food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses. Non-slip Rubber Feet: Non-slip rubber feet ensure safe placement. Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base and features a wide mouth bottle for convenient hand-washing.

Questions and AnswersÔºö

Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?A: Usually,the first day when he use it, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.Q: Will the water overflow?A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?A: We use food grade plastic material, safe and tasteless.

1.Automatic supply feeder and waterer set: Natural gravity supply system, no electricity required, Eco-friendly and can be used anywhere.
2.Size and Capacity: both feeder and waterer measures 32x21x32cm;large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7days for small pets,3 days for big pets, you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party, do not have to worry about pets will be hungry.
3.Humanization design: Side cut-out handles for easy lifting and cleaning,non-skid rubber feet for secure placement.
4.Easy to clean: barrel and chassis of the automatic feeder can be split, you can rinse directly with water, it is recommended to wash once a week
5.MATERIAL:BPA Free. Made of environmentally safe,non-toxic plastic. Protect your pet’s health.

Small & Big Dogs and Cats Automatic Food and Water Feeder Set

3.8L Big Capacity

  • Both cat dog feeder and waterer measures 35.5 x 17.5 x 27 cm / 13.97 x 6.89 x 10.63 inch.
  • Large capacity 3.8L, can last about 7 days for small pets, 3 days for big pets, travel Accessories.
  • you can rest assured to go on vacation, work, party.

Pets Gravity Food and Water Dispenser set

Automatic Gravity Flow Technology

The food feer and water dispenser adopt Natural Gravity Supply System, food and water will gradually fill for pets eat and drink. It is no electricity required at all, can be used anywhere, and suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. perfect for pet parents with busy lifestyles.

  • Food Grade Material: Our feeder and waterer made of food grade plastic, 100% BPA Free. Protect your pet’s health.
  • Fresh Water and Food Anytime: The bowl refills with water/ food as it empties, keeping water and food fresh inside the reservoir until it dispenses.
  • Non-slip Rubber Feet: Non-slip rubber feet ensure safe placement.
  • Easy to Clean: The bottle is easy to unscrew from the base and features a wide mouth bottle for convenient hand-washing.

Read more

Questions and AnswersÔºö

  • Q: Will my dog eat much more than he need as this is automatic?
  • A: Usually,the first day when he use it, maybe he will eat much, but our pets are smarter than we think, They will slowly quit this bad habit.
  • Q: Will the water overflow?
  • A: When the water in the water tank reaches a certain height, the spring device in the middle of the barrel mouth will automatically close, and the water will stop flowing; when the water is below a certain height, the spring device will automatically open and continue to flow out.
  • Q: How is the quality? does it have smell?
  • A: We use food grade plastic material, safe and tasteless.

A more stylish alternative to sweatpants, a more comfortable alternative to jeans.
regular fit, straight leg, drawstring closure
Polyester/Nylon Spandex Blend Fabric – quick dry, lightweight, breathable, moisture wicking, provides soft wearing comfort and has 4-way stretch for outdoor performance.
Security Zipper Pockets – offer convenient safe places to stash your essentials.
Full Elastic Waistband with Drawstring Closure – means a comfortable, secure fit.
Straight Leg Design – adds versatility and enables the pants to look great with hiking boots, athletic sneakers or even flip flops.
Ideal to wear for exercises, sports or relaxed weekends at home, these athletic and lounge pants will slot seamlessly into your casual collection. Wear them on the sidelines of your kid’s soccer game, to the gym for your workout, while out jogging, or even walking the dog. They are not only soft, comfortable to wear, but they look great as well.
